tool_description: Sends personalized review request messages across multiple channels including email, SMS, and push notifications with delivery tracking.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs to send messages to

message_content.description: Personalized message content for each customer

channel_preferences.description: Preferred communication channel for each customer: email, sms, push, or multiple

send_times.description: Scheduled send times for each customer in date-time format

priority_level.description: Message priority: low, normal, high, urgent

track_opens.description: Whether to track message opens and clicks

retry_failed.description: Whether to retry failed message deliveries

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: customer_ids, message_content, and channel_preferences must have the same length.
Invalid channel preference: Use one of [email, sms, push, multiple].
Invalid send time format: send_times must be in valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid priority level: Must be one of [low, normal, high, urgent].
Invalid retry count: max_retries must be between 0 and 5.
Message delivery service unavailable: Unable to connect to messaging services.
Invalid customer contact info: Some customers have incomplete contact information.
usage: Provide customer IDs, personalized messages, and channel preferences to send review requests. Optionally set send times, priority, and retry parameters for optimal delivery.

messages_sent.description: Total number of messages successfully sent

failed_deliveries.description: Number of messages that failed to send

delivery_ids.description: Unique delivery tracking IDs for each sent message

send_status.description: Delivery status for each message: sent, failed, scheduled, retry

estimated_delivery_times.description: Estimated delivery times for each message
